title: NO SECURITY DEPOSIT- FAIRFAX DISTRICT- LRG LOWER 1BEDROOM
posting_body: NO SECURITY DEPOSIT- FAIRFAX DISTRICT- LRG LOWER 1BEDROOM
700 OR HIGHER CREDIT SCORE IS REQUIRED
***Pictures attached are from a similar unit not actual***
Fairfax and Melrose-
This Unit is truly Special.
It is breath taken as soon as you walk in.
From the Vaulted Ceilings and the arche ways…Every room has a classic unique touch.
This unit features, Wood floors throughout, French windows all around and great for cross ventilation.
Natural Sunlight, Lots of storage, stove and fridge is included in the unit.
New kitchen with New Counter tops and a gorgeous backsplash.
A Large 1 bedroom with 2 closets, 1 charming bathroom covered in its original tiles.
The tub is separate from the shower stall.
The building is controlled access, Street parking (with Permit), pet maybe,
NO UTILITIES ARE INCLUDED.
There is laundry on site (Operated with Smart phone/App)..
12 Month lease.
Street parking only.
The Building has a cool vibe and is located on an over-sized corner lot.
Fairfax High School is one block away with tracks, Basketball courts, Tennis courts etc.
No need for a gym!!
Go the High School for free.
There is a wonderful flea market at the high school every Sunday.
Walking distance to Fairfax, The Grove/The Farmers Market, & Melrose where all the Most popular Shops and Bars/Restaurants are located.
No need to drive anymore!!
Everything is walking distance.
The ultimate in Green Living!!!
Visit our website
